jgame

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A cache for sounds.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SoundManager.Sound
      A sound reference that can be stopped by the user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.ByteArrayInputStream> byteCache
      The byte cache.

      The map of classes to caches.
      protected java.lang.Class<?> clazz
      The main game class.
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> currentlyPreloading
      The list of sound names currently being loaded.
      private static SoundManager defaultCache
      The default sound manager, used for static convenience methods.
      private java.lang.String prefix
      The prefix for filenames passed to this cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private SoundManager(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Creates the sound cache with no prefix.
      private SoundManager(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String prefix)
      Creates the sound manager with the given filename prefix and sets this as the default cache.

      • SoundManager

        Creates the sound cache with no prefix.

                     java.lang.String prefix)

    • Method Detail

      • forClass

        public static SoundManager forClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Gets the sound manager for the given class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to fetch the sound manager for
        Returns:
        the sound manager, or null if none exists

      • loopSoundForever

        public static SoundManager.Sound loopSoundForever(java.lang.String name)
        Starts a sound with the given name from the default cache. The sound will loop forever.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        a sound reference; you can use this to stop the sound

      • stopAllSounds

        public static void stopAllSounds()
        Stops all sounds currently playing.

      • create

        public static SoundManager create(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates and returns a sound manager, and sets the cache as the default cache.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the main game class to which this cache applies
        Returns:
        the new cache
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the class is null

      • create

        public static SoundManager create(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                  java.lang.String prefix)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates and returns a sound manager with the given filename prefix, and sets the cache as the default cache.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the main game class to which this cache applies
        prefix - the filename prefix
        Returns:
        the new cache
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the class is null

      • playSound

        public static SoundManager.Sound playSound(java.lang.String name)
        Starts a sound with the given name from the default cache. The sound will play once.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        a sound reference; you can use this to stop the clip before it has finished

      • preloadSound

        public static boolean preloadSound(java.lang.String name)
        Preloads the given sound from the default cache, but does not play it. The sound can be played later with the play(String) method.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        true if the preloading succeeded or has already been performed successfully, or false if it failed

      • preloadSoundAsync

        public static void preloadSoundAsync(java.lang.String name)
        Preloads the given sound from the default cache asynchronously. This method will not block; that is, it will not wait for the sound to load before returning.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the sound to preload

      • createClip

        private javax.sound.sampled.Clip createClip(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a clip from the given file name.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename
        Returns:
        a clip reference

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Gets the filename prefix for this cache.
        Returns:
        the prefix

      • loopForever

        public SoundManager.Sound loopForever(java.lang.String name)
        Starts a sound with the given name. The sound will loop forever.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        a sound reference; you can use this to stop the sound

      • play

        public SoundManager.Sound play(java.lang.String name)
        Starts a sound with the given name. The sound will play once.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        a sound reference; you can use this to stop the clip before it has finished

      • preload

        public boolean preload(java.lang.String name)
        Preloads the given sound, but does not play it. The sound can be played later with the play(String) method.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the clip to play
        Returns:
        true if the preloading succeeded or has already been performed successfully, or false if it failed

      • preloadAsync

        public void preloadAsync(java.lang.String name)
        Preloads the given sound asynchronously. This method will not block; that is, it will not wait for the sound to load before returning.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename of the sound to preload

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the filename prefix for this cache. This will only affect cache objects that have not yet begun loading.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the new prefix, or null to clear the prefix
